alert.note: Alert for Madison (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 7:22AM CST until January 03 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 815 AM CST. * At 722 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bakers, or 17 miles northeast of Winnsboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Tendal around 735 AM CST. Tallulah around 750 AM CST. Mansford and Omega around 755 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mound, Delta and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northeastern Louisiana...and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
